title: More bad luck for Ineos Grenadiers: Geraint Thomas down, Thymen Arensman to the hospital
content:
The British powerhouse lost its second rider of this Vuelta a España: 'It’s just bike racing isn’t it, it’s a risky sport.'

Read the full article at More bad luck for Ineos Grenadiers: Geraint Thomas down, Thymen Arensman to the hospital on Velo.
author: ahood
